page.title: 10We don't get bored!
page.content: Our main source of entertainment is watching television. Our favourite programmes include films and cartoons. When we get bored with television we like to go and play outside with our friends.Some of us like to go to the recreation ground where we play on the swings or play football and sometimes we play 'hide and seek'. When we are on our own some of us play records, read or sketch something. Our{hobbies}include many things.Some of us like to go to the local swimming pool especially in the summer months. Many of the boys enjoy playing on their BMX bikes and even some of the girls do some scrambling. At home we find many interesting moments going through our collections of various things like stamps,rubbers, key-rings and model-cars. Some of us play games on our computers.
